description: This file defines a payment service interface with multiple payment providers implemented as dataclasses. It includes provider protocols, concrete implementations for Mock, Stripe, and Razorpay, and a factory function to select the active provider based on settings.

classes.name: PaymentProvider
classes.description: Protocol defining the interface for payment providers, including methods for creating sessions and verifying webhooks.

classes.name: MockProvider
classes.description: A mock implementation of PaymentProvider for testing purposes.

classes.name: StripeProvider
classes.description: A payment provider implementation for Stripe, with session creation and webhook verification.

classes.name: RazorpayProvider
classes.description: A payment provider implementation for Razorpay, with session creation and webhook verification.

methods.name: PaymentProvider get_payment_provider()
methods.description: Factory function that returns an appropriate PaymentProvider implementation based on current settings.

methods.name: Dict[str,Any] create_session(self, user_id: str, book_id: str, amount_cents: int, currency: str)
Dict[str,Any] verify_webhook(self, payload: bytes, headers: Dict[str, str])
